directions.step:
Prepare pudding as directed on box, except use 1/2 cup less milk for a thicker pudding. Stir in sweetened condensed milk & whipped topping. Line large bowl with vanilla wafers. Slice bananas over top of wafers. Pour pudding mixture over all. Repeat layers of wafers, bananas & pudding. Chill until set.
MRS. T.J. BARNES
